## Description {#details}

## Public Member Attributes

### Address {#a70339398304baa1ee590858b889e5c77}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="object::SectionedAddress llvm::DWARFDebugLine::Row::Address">
The program-counter value corresponding to a machine instruction generated by the compiler and section index pointing to the section containg this PC.

If relocation information is present then section index is the index of the section which contains above address. Otherwise this is object::SectionedAddress::Undef value.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-h/#l00152">152</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-h">DWARFDebugLine.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### BasicBlock {#a1795094c7f6888be4b9f9d90675617af}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint8&#95;t llvm::DWARFDebugLine::Row::BasicBlock</>}>
A boolean indicating that the current instruction is the beginning of a basic block.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-h/#l00179">179</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-h">DWARFDebugLine.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Column {#a93a4cbd3adbf703afef361afd4c0c08a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint16&#95;t llvm::DWARFDebugLine::Row::Column</>}>
An unsigned integer indicating a column number within a source line.

Columns are numbered beginning at 1. The value 0 is reserved to indicate that a statement begins at the &#39;left edge&#39; of the line.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-h/#l00160">160</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-h">DWARFDebugLine.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Discriminator {#a4a41463a44a6f4e0a44d061579d1356a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint32&#95;t llvm::DWARFDebugLine::Row::Discriminator</>}>
An unsigned integer representing the DWARF path discriminator value for this location.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-h/#l00166">166</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-h">DWARFDebugLine.h</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-h/#l00176">176</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-h">DWARFDebugLine.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Line {#a4045d634bf622d7852f9bde7d5644ae7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint32&#95;t llvm::DWARFDebugLine::Row::Line</>}>
An unsigned integer indicating a source line number.

Lines are numbered beginning at 1. The compiler may emit the value 0 in cases where an instruction cannot be attributed to any source line.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-h/#l00156">156</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-h">DWARFDebugLine.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### OpIndex {#afff915f47d495facecd4b17a46a04675}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint8&#95;t llvm::DWARFDebugLine::Row::OpIndex</>}>
An unsigned integer representing the index of an operation within a VLIW instruction.

The index of the first operation is 0. For non-VLIW architectures, this register will always be 0.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-h/#l00173">173</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-h">DWARFDebugLine.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### PrologueEnd {#a74a248095abd0d7e9a2b8a4d0247881b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint8&#95;t llvm::DWARFDebugLine::Row::PrologueEnd</>}>
A boolean indicating that the current address is one (of possibly many) where execution should be suspended for an entry breakpoint of a function.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-h/#l00187">187</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugline-h">DWARFDebugLine.h</a>.
